summary: Adds Chicken Noodle Soup and Ramen to the Game
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i566.photobucket.com/albums/ss101/Ashfyr/Untitled-4.png[/IMG]



[color=\"#FF0000\"]What this mods Does:[/color] 
This adds new soups to the cook pot. Chicken Noodle soup, which cures diseases, and Ramen, which energizes you.

The Chicken Noodle soup is made by 1 chicken breast and 4 Wheat
The Ramen is made by 1 Black-Brair Mead and 3 Wheat

_________________________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________________________



[color=\"#FF0000\"]Installation (Manual):[/color] 
Copy Contents over to your Data Folder, make sure \"Soup.esp\" is ticked in Data Files on the Launcher or NMM
_________________________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________________________



[color=\"#FF0000\"]Unistallation (Manual):[/color] 
Delete the \"Food\\Soup\" Folder in the \"Ashfyr\" Folder in Both your Meshes and Textures Folder, and Delete Soup.esp as well. 
You can optionally just delete the Ashfyr Folder if you do not have any other mods of mine installed
_________________________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________________________



[color=\"#FF0000\"]Credits:[/color] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6107]Kjell Granlund (liv2dieat8): For the Meshes and Textures[/url]
bowlfreaknot: For the Idea of the Chicken Noodle Soup
_________________________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________________________


[color=\"#FF0000\"]Permission:[/color] 
You can upload, alter or change this mod however you feel without credit to me, though it would be rather nice if you did. 
________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________


[color=\"#FF0000\"]Changelog:[/color] 
1.0: Released
1.1: renamed the Ramen from Raman to proper spelling
________________________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________________________
